compounddef.title: FULL Convert Sparse Matrix to Full Matrix

sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Converts a sparse matrix to a full matrix. The syntax for its use is y = full(x) The type of x is preserved. Be careful with the function. As a general rule of thumb, if you can work with the full representation of a function, you probably do not need the sparse representation.

sect1.title: Example
sect1.para: Here we convert a full matrix to a sparse one, and back again.
